about_the_game:
August 11th is the day when Fishing Planet was first released to the public a few years ago! This very special Pack isn’t just meant to honor the beginning of our mutual journey toward our virtual fishing dream.
Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack is basically a wonderful bargain combining everything you might need for going after the big bad Salmon in our FP Anniversary Cup. Make sure you’re the number one Salmon catcher with the exclusive super powerful spinning combos of Salmonster™ muscular rods and RedFish™ reels meant to withstand any pressure a Salmon fishing Tournament might bring. Exclusive equipment is available only in this limited edition Pack along with all the spinners, crankbaits, jigheads, and other tackle to help you gain your rightful title of the FPA Cup Champion!
In short, Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack is a set of superb tackle and equipment that you’ll need for getting the most fun and drive out of big game fishing for the red monsters lurking in the depth of unexplored Mongolian waterways.

Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCONS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 40 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setups Slots

RODS ‘N REELS to enhance your skills in catching some of the biggest Salmon.
Rods:
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 8' 2" (220) - Length: 8' 2" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz (18-56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 15 – 42 lb (7-19.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 3/4 – 2 1/8 Oz (21-60 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 18 – 46 lb (8.5-21 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11
Reels:
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 4500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 27.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 20/110 (0.4/110), braid 30/145 (0.28/145); Max Drag: 35 Lb. (16 kg)
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 5500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/110 (0.5/110), braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 42 Lb. (19 kg)

LURES - a selection of lures we put a lot of thought into, so that you can sit back and just catch that Salmon!
Lines:
* Fluoro .022" (0.55 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 35 Lb (15.1 kg)
* Fluoro .024" (0.6 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 40 Lb (18.1 kg)
* Fluoro .025" (0.65 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 44 Lb (20 kg)
Lures:
* JigHeads: JigHead 1 Oz. (30 g) #6/0, JigHead 7/8 Oz. (25 g) #4/0, JigHead 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0, JigHead 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g) #4/0, JigHead 1 5/8 Oz. (48 g) #6/0, JigHead 2 Oz. (56 g) #4/0, JigHead 2 Oz. (56 g) #6/0
* Softbait: Nymphes 3" (7.5 cm) (x2) Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (x2)
* Spoons: Single Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x3) Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x3)
* Spinners: Bullet Spinner 6/7 Oz. (24 g), #2/0 (x4), Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g), #4/0 (x4)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft (1 m) #3/0, Crankbait 6 ft (2 m) #3/0, Crankbait 8 ft (2.5 m) #6/0, Crankbait 12 ft (3.5 m) #4/0, Crankbait 16 ft (5 m) #3/0, Crankbait 16 ft (5 m) #6/0
* Walkers: Mouse Lure 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #5/0 (x2), Mouse Lure 1 5/7 Oz (48 g), #7/0 (x2)

EQUIPMENT – Some valuable items of the limited Fishing Planet Anniversary collectible edition!
* FPA Cup Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* FPA Cup Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* FishCastle L Fishnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 110 Lb. (50 kg); Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb. (200 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Alaska License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced California License
* Advanced Mongolia License

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

name: Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack is basically a wonderful bargain combining everything you might need for going after the big bad Salmon in our FP Anniversary Cup.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
